CustomField.formula: IF( Core_Shell_Cost_Parameter__r.Duplicate_Maintenance_Related__c = true,( Unit_Cost__c * Total_Units__c * Core_Shell_Cost_Parameter__r.PCT__c * 100 * Project_Cost_Summary__r.Project_Name__r.Core_Shell_Adjustment_Factor__c) ,(Total_Cost__c * Core_Shell_Cost_Parameter__r.PCT__c * Project_Cost_Summary__r.Project_Name__r.Core_Shell_Adjustment_Factor__c))
CustomField.label: Replacement Cost
